title: 30 Minute Ear Acupuncture + 15 Minute Guided Meditation | ILW
description: Auricular Acupuncture or Ear Acupuncture can help to relieve anxiety and is also used to help manage sadness, grief, fear, trauma and addiction. It's simple and relaxing and the more you do it the longer the effects will last.When you come in, we will discuss what brought you in and develop an individualized plan together as far as how often to receive this treatment to achieve the best results for you.
